Package aom.scripting.xs.tr

Class Cinematic

Object
Cinematic
public class Cinematic
extends Object
This class provides a collection of Trigger commands concerning Cinematics, the Camera and Waypoints.
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Puts the camera in the specified location

  • Method Details

    • trCameraCut

      public void trCameraCut​(vector pos, vector dir, vector up, vector right)
      Puts the camera in the specified location

    • trCameraShake

      public void trCameraShake​(float duration, float strength)
      Makes the camera shake.

    • trCamTrackLoad

      public void trCamTrackLoad​(string filename)
      Loads a camera track.

    • trCamTrackPlay

      public void trCamTrackPlay​(float duration, int eventID)
      Plays the current camera track, and optinally calls and event when done.

      If the given duration is -1, the duration of the track is used.

    • trCinematicAbort

      public bool trCinematicAbort()
      Returns whether the player has requested the cinematic to be skipped.

    • trCinematicDoAbort

      public void trCinematicDoAbort()
      Pretends a player has requested a cinematic to be skipped, i.e. trCinematicAbort() will return true after this call.

    • trForceNonCinematicModels

      public void trForceNonCinematicModels()
      Forces models to be in non-cinematic mode.

    • trLetterBox

      public void trLetterBox​(bool on)
      Turns letter box mode (cinematic mode) on or off.

    • trOverlayText

      public void trOverlayText​(string message, float duration, int x, int y, int width)
      Puts up a big movie-credits style text overlay, optionally in a strange location.

      x, y, and width are relative to the top left of a 1024x768 pixels display. If any of these values is -1, the default position is used.

      On widescreen monitors, the text will still be at the very left of the monitor at x=0, but somewhere in the right center at x=1000, and lines will wrap there as if the screen ended.

    • trOverlayTextColour

      public void trOverlayTextColour​(float r, float g, float b)
      Sets the overlay text colour.
      Since:
      AoM:EE

    • trWaypointAddPoint

      public void trWaypointAddPoint​(vector a)
      Adds the waypoint into the trigger selection system.

    • trWaypointAddUnit

      public void trWaypointAddUnit​(string unitScenarioName)
      Adds the unit's position as a waypoint in the trigger selection system.

    • trWaypointClear

      public void trWaypointClear()
      Clears the waypoints in the trigger selection system
